svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

version="29.1.1"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="MxvuX9szApexmP01UcWr"> <mxGraphModel dx="3443" dy="1413" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=top;rounded=0;" value="<b><font style="color: rgb(215, 155, 0); font-size: 14px;">All the orange entities contain:</font></b><div><b><font style="color: rgb(215, 155, 0); font-size: 17px;">EBUQCID = 1234W</font></b><div><font style="color: rgb(215, 155, 0);"><font color="#d79b00"><span style="font-size: 17px;"><b>EBUQCVersion = 2.0</b></span></font></font></div></div><div><font style="color: rgb(215, 155, 0);"><font color="#d79b00" style="font-size: 14px;"><b style="">which together identify qcitemdef_1</b></font></font></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="119" width="270" x="150" y="731" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-25" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=top;rounded=0;" value="<div><font color="#9673a6" style="font-size: 14px;"><b style="">All the purple entities contain:</b></font></div><div><font color="#9673a6"><span style="font-size: 17px;"><b>EBUQCID = 9999X</b></span></font></div><div><font color="#9673a6"><span style="font-size: 17px;"><b>EBUQCVersion = 3.7</b></span></font></div><div><font color="#9673a6" style="font-size: 14px;"><b style="">which together identify qcitemdef_2</b></font></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="119" width="270" x="451" y="731" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-33" edge="1" parent="1" style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><font style="color: rgb(150, 115, 166);">InstanceId</font></b></font><div><b style="background-color: as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="121" y="280" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-45" connectable="0" parent="1" style="group" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-46" connectable="0" parent="1" style="group" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="90" x="-180" y="288" as="geometry" y="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-47" edge="1" parent="1" source="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-43" style="curved=1;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=4;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;entryX=0.032;entryY=0.25;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=1;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" <mxPoint x="90" y="420" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-48" edge="1" parent="1" source="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-44" style="curved=1;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=4;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;entryX=0.048;entryY=0.167;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" target="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-6" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="60" y="320" /> </Array> <mxPoint x="-110" y="320" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="110" y="390" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-49" parent="1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=top;rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;" value="<div><b style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); background-color: transparent;"><font style="font-size: 14px; color: rgb(108, 142, 191);">The test template (containing QCItemDefiniton instances), the broadcaster QC requirements, and details about the media content itself are all used to create qcprofile_1</font></b></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="230" x="-74" y="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-50" parent="1" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;" value="<div style="forced-color-adjust: none; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: center; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"><b style="color: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163)); font-size: 14px;">The QCItem instances apply the relevant QCItemDefinition instances to the testing scenario.&nbsp;</b><b style="font-size: 14px; color: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163)); background-color: transparent;">In this case&nbsp;qcitemdef_1 is used to create both qcitem_1 and qcitem_2</b></div><div style="forced-color-adjust: none; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: center; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"><b style="font-size: 14px; color: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163)); background-color: transparent;"><br></b></div><div style="forced-color-adjust: none; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: center; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"><b style="font-size: 14px; color: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163)); background-color: transparent;">Each QCItemResult instance details the result of testing the specified media file according to its partner QCItem instance</b></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="645" x="112.5" y="840" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-51" parent="1" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=right;labelBackgroundColor=none;" value="<div style="forced-color-adjust: none; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"><b style="forced-color-adjust: none; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><font style="forced-color-adjust: none; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(108, 142, 191);">qcprofile_1 is a QCProfile instance and describes the testing performed on a specific media file to meet specific broadcaster QC requirements</font></b></div><div style="forced-color-adjust: none; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"><b style="forced-color-adjust: none; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><font style="forced-color-adjust: none; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(108, 142, 191);"><br></font></b></div><div style="forced-color-adjust: none; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"><b style="forced-color-adjust: none; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><font style="forced-color-adjust: none; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(108, 142, 191);">Here qcprofile_1 is embedded in qcreport_1 which is a QCReport instance and gives results of testing the specified media file according to qcprofile_1</font></b></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="280" x="-270" y="430" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-52" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontStyle=2" value="Copies of the relevant QCItemDefinition instances can optionally be included (not shown)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="75" width="120" x="680" y="432.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4NGglV_Hotyfehk0NfVp-54" parent="1" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;align=right;" value="<div style="forced-color-adjust: none; font-family: Helvetica; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"><b style="font-size: 14px; background-color: transparent;"><font style="color: rgb(108, 142, 191);">qc.ebu.io provides a tool for creating and managing QCItemDefinition instances and includes a large catalogue of these instances as well as some "templates"</font></b></div><div style="forced-color-adjust: none; font-family: Helvetica; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"><b style="font-size: 14px; background-color: transparent;"><font style="color: rgb(108, 142, 191);"><br></font></b></div><div style="forced-color-adjust: none; font-family: Helvetica; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><font style="color: rgb(108, 142, 191);"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><b style=""><i>Note: qc.ebu.io refers to QCItemDefinition instances as "QC Items"</i></b></span></font></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="450" x="250" y="67" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zVr5LBoJMYebMKBjWzh4-1" parent="1" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" value="<div style="forced-color-adjust: none; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: right; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"><span><font style="forced-color-adjust: none; color: rgb(108, 142, 191);"><span style="forced-color-adjust: none; font-size: 14px;"><b style="forced-color-adjust: none;">The use of test templates is optional. A template can provide a convenient collection of QCItemDefinition instances for a particular purpose&nbsp;â€“</b></span></font><b style="font-size: 14px; color: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));">&nbsp;in this case the testing of MXF files.</b></span></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="65" width="410" x="290" y="290" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
